description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller class 'ResumeController' that provides CRUD endpoints for managing resume resources, including listing, fetching, deleting, and patching resumes. It interacts with a ResumeRepository and uses annotations for API documentation and request mapping.

classes.name: ResumeController
classes.description: REST controller managing resume resources with CRUD endpoints.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of resumes for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a specific resume by ID for the authenticated user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a resume by ID if owned by the authenticated user.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Updates the fullText of a resume by ID for the authenticated user.
